name: AFTERLOVE
description:
If we could escape from our memory, it would be much easier... But in the end, our personalities are formed by our experiences, be they positive or negative. Unfortunately, the negative experiences are usually the strongest ones.

Do you know what it feels like to lose love? Of course, you do. Everybody does.

It’s nothing new, but each time and for each person, it’s the collapse of their universe.

Losing love is painful, and many people try to escape from pain in any affordable form of anesthesia. In this project I consciously investigate the emotions, giving them a visual and symbolic shape. I live my life through photography, converting my personal experience into pictures.

_____

Note to collectors: if you wish to get a high-resolution PDF, please contact me via Twitter @pleshkova_art
